title: The louers melancholy Acted at the Priuate House in the Blacke Friers, and publikely at the Globe by the Kings Maiesties Seruants.
author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
publisher: Printed [by Felix Kingston] for H. Seile, and are to be sold at the Tygers head in Saint Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The main plot is from:  Daniel, Samuel.  Hymens triumph.
A variant (STC 11163.3) has "printed for H.S." in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
